ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
Matt Kindt!
A new, horror crime series by Matt Kindt (Mind MGMT) and Tyler Jenkins (Grass Kings)!
As agents Winters and Mitchum hunt down the supernatural murder box known as the ''Fear Case,'' their trail goes off course, and the powers and kill list of the case grow higher!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Tyler Jenkins | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Wilfredo Torres & Bill Crabtree | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-26 03:47:57. [CVDB842160]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bill Crabtree, Tyler Jenkins, Wilfredo Torres
